solution.text:
Volume = Difference in volumes between outer and inner cylinder
\(=\pi \times {r_ o}^2 \times h - \pi \times {r_ i}^2 \times h\)
\(=_{{trunc( pi_val*((j+2)**2)*k, 2 )}}_ - _{{trunc( pi_val*(j**2)*k, 2 )}}_\)
\(=_{{trunc( (pi_val*((j+2)**2)*k)-(pi_val*(j**2)*k), 2 )}}_ cm^3\)

content.text: In the figure below Inner Radius =_{j}_ cm, Outer Radius = _{{j+2}}_ cm, Height = _{k}_ cm, find its volume
